citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
02-Nov-16.
Called exhibitor on her cell phone upon arriving at the site. She stated that she was exhibiting some of her animals
about 30 mins away. She was finishing up, but had personal appointments in the afternoon that could not be
rescheduled.
